cleaned_text: A healthy immune system keeps infections and other diseases at bay, but an autoimmune disorder can compromise the system's regular immune function. Board-certified naturopathic doctor Yoojin Lee-Sedera, ND, OMD, and the team at Las Vegas Integrative Medicine provide exceptional integrative care for the more than 100 different autoimmune diseases that are currently known. Call the office in Las Vegas, Nevada, or schedule your appointment online today. Autoimmune disorders are chronic health conditions caused by dysregulated immune function. Your immune system, which normally protects you from external pathogens, defectively attacks otherwise healthy tissues. The exact tissues involved depend on the autoimmune condition you have. A variety of symptoms can result from autoimmune disorders, including skin rashes, digestive problems, fatigue, and chronic pain. At Las Vegas Integrative Medicine, the team addresses the whole of your health instead of focusing on reducing or masking specific symptoms. Through complementary and naturopathic medicine, they can help you minimize the need for numerous pharmaceutical medications and clinical treatments or surgeries while reducing the symptoms and discomfort by restoring the balance of your health. There are more than 100 known autoimmune conditions, many of which run in families.
